tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: I took the Psych of Terrorism & Genocide with Dr. Horton. He was one of the most organized, thoughtful, and open-minded professors I\'ve had. Definitely do all the readings as the class is paper based. He does not give in-class exams which is nice because you can work on the exams at home. I would take a class with him again! Really nice man!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Dr. horton is one of the nicest professors at SU, hes very helpful when asked for help and is a very generous grader! I learned a lot from him and would take every class he offers. Strongly recommended for those who want to learn a thing or two.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Dr. Horton is the most boring lecturer i\'ve ever had the displeasure of being forced to listen to. He takes an already boring topic (history and schools of psychology) and makes it even MORE boring. Clearly enjoys the sound of his own voice. Tests are hard and he gives out a "study guide" that covers essentially every tiny detail. Useless.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Sweetest guy in the world. Very passionate & extremely helpful. Can be very redundant in the way he speaks though, but I learned a lot! He asks great questions. No tests, just lots of little papers and one big paper! Readings are ALWAYS interesting!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Good teacher, made the class interesting.
